description: This is a shell script providing utilities for managing sstate cache files in a build environment, including options for removing duplicates, cleaning based on stamps directories, and various configurations.

methods.name: usage
methods.description: Displays usage instructions and options for the script.

methods.name: no_files
methods.description: Outputs a message indicating there are no files to remove.

methods.name: do_nothing
methods.description: Outputs a message indicating no action is needed.

methods.name: read_confirm
methods.description: Prompts the user for confirmation to proceed with deletion based on the number of files scheduled for removal.

methods.name: echo_error
methods.description: Outputs an error message to stderr and exits the script.

methods.name: gen_rmlist
methods.description: Generates a list of files to be removed, including handling symlinks and associated .siginfo files.

methods.name: remove_duplicated
methods.description: Removes duplicate sstate cache files in the cache directory, keeping only the newest one per package, with various options for configuration.

methods.name: rm_by_stamps
methods.description: Removes sstate files not used by specified stamp directories, aimed at cleaning up unused cache files.
